about_the_game:
In That's My Space, you take on the role of a space explorer in a thrilling adventure to conquer the universe. Gather resources from asteroids, moons and enemy spaceships, and use them to craft powerful weapons and upgrades to take down your enemies and dominate their planets.

That's My Space combines roguelite mechanics with crafting and exploration, in a way that you not only need to survive the enemies, but also decide what's better for you to craft and focus on leveling up, without wasting your resources.

Current Content:

  • 2 Completely Different GameModes
  • 1 + 7 Unlockable Spaceships
  • 5 Types of Weapons
  • 5 Levels of Weapon Progression
  • 2 Types of Weapon Evolutions
  • 7 Spaceship Upgrades

The Adventure Mode is where your conquering begins!
Take your time and be free to explore a procedurally generated universe in search for asteroids, fight enemies along the way and upgrade your equipments, or just drift around with your spaceship. The main objective in this mode is to equip yourself and kill Kryon, the leader of the Kryo Nation.


The Survival Mode is where you put your skills to test. Fight an unending amount of enemies from all nations and score the most points. Here the action is intense, enemies get stronger with time and every crafting decision counts. You must find the best strategy to survive each minute, manage your current resources and then find the best way to keep upgrading your spaceship.

So strap in, power up your engines, and get ready for this insane adventure in That's My Space, the Universe is yours!
